column4: My swap is not being used in ubuntu, and I am having a terrible time getting return from suspend to work.... I've already googled it to no avail, but i did find something that was similar to my problem but i have problems getting it to work : http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-321807.html
how much ram you have and how large is swap ?
I have 2 gigs of ram and my swap is about 3 gigs
I was able to see that 0 out of 2996112 was being used of my swap by typing "free" in the terminal
